credentials_craft_token.title: CredentialsCraft Token
credentials_craft_token.description: Long-term CredentialsCraft Access Token (NOT Yandex token).

log_source.title: Log Source
log_source.description: Log Source to export (hits or visits)

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: A list of chosen field names. For hits see: https://yandex.ru/dev/metrika/doc/api2/logs/fields/hits.html, for visits see: https://yandex.ru/dev/metrika/doc/api2/logs/fields/visits.html. ID and Datetime fields is required for both source types

date_from.title: Date From
date_from.description: Start date for the reporting period in YYYY-MM-DD format.

date_to.title: Date To
date_to.description: End date for the reporting period in YYYY-MM-DD format. Yesterday if not set

last_days.title: Load Last N Days
last_days.description: If not set â€“ last 30 days will be used

clean_on_every_slice.title: Clean Logs On Server On Every Day Load
clean_on_every_slice.description: Connector will send clean logs request for configured Counter ID after every report load (useful on large logs size due to 10GB of total logs size limit).

chunk_reports.title: Split Report Into Chunks
chunk_reports.description: Connector can split data replication into several reports instead of only one. You can choice days period for every chunk.

split_range_days_count.title: Split Range Days Count
split_range_days_count.description: E.g. if you choose 30 days, whole report will be split into several reports by every month (30 days). It can increase replication time, so don't set too small range. Minimum - 1

client_name.title: Client Name Constant
client_name.description: Constant that will be used in record __clientName property

product_name.title: Product Name Constant
product_name.description: Constant that will be used in record __productName property

custom_data_json.title: Custom Data JSON
custom_data_json.description: Custom Data JSON for additional record properties. Must be string of JSON object with first-level properties

multithreading_threads_count.title: Multithreading Threads Count
multithreading_threads_count.description: Yandex Metrika usually supports up to 3 concurrent log requests creation jobs.

check_log_requests_ability.title: Check Log Requests Ability
check_log_requests_ability.description: Log requests for slices based on Split Report Into Chunks parameter will be checked for creation ability on every sync start and on config save.

clean_log_requests_before_replication.title: Clean Log Requests Before Replication
clean_log_requests_before_replication.description: ALL log requests stored on Yandex servers will be deleted before every sync

clean_every_log_request_after_success.title: Clean Log Request After Success
clean_every_log_request_after_success.description: Log requests is replicated one after another. Due to Yandex storage limitation (usually of 10 GB) connector can delete every successfully replicated log request from Yandex server
